divs: Sighting Detailsgot an instant message from a friend of my brothers online saying he saw something near a small resivouir near where he lives..its not to far from where I live so I went outside to see if I could see something..went out to the backyard and thats when I saw it..low flying,no sound,first glowing close to street light colored..it flew a little bit below the treeline around our neighborhood..circled about 4 times around the area like it was looking for something..before it dissappeared behind the treeline in our backyard it turned to a brite white after the third time it circled before it dissappeared. Im suprised no one else saw it besides me,my brother,and my mom,we thought it mightve been a baloon or something at first..but it flew at a consistant elevation..and didnt float.I was quite shocked..a little scared too and excited along with awe.could see a slight dark disk outline contrast above the glowing..it looked like a really flat cieling light almost.quite strange,never saw anything like that since.
Summary: Glowing, street light color to brite white, glowing on bottom, dark slim outline on top.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Holden
There were no other sightings in Holden on or around September 5th 2005
